channel.title: Penthium / 24-7 Hosted / Nice Mature Playeres / Loyal Staff / Join us n
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2yjwyeo.png[/img]
Website : www.penthium.org (WILL MAKE A GFX FOR THAT TOMORROW, TIRED NOW <3)[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/28u1oom.png[/img]
24/7 Hosted on a VPS Auto Vote Highscores Player Statistics and Armour implemented into the Highscores Noob Friendly Website Unique Login-Screen Loyal Mature Players 5+ Minigames 7+ Training Areas New Epic GFX's and Emotes ! Friendly and Fair Staff NO DOWNTIME ! vBulletin Forums Nice Community ... and many many more !
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/5513d3.png[/img]
[youtube]http://youtu.be/6hLhqB_C_r8[/youtube]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/149tum9.png[/img]
[youtube]http://youtu.be/IFNpAqKMxSI[/youtube]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rmpkqs.png[/img]
[IMG]http://penthium.org/includes/img/sliderimage5.png[/img] [IMG]http://penthium.org/includes/img/sliderimage4.png[/img] [IMG]http://penthium.org/includes/img/sliderimage3.png[/img] [IMG]http://penthium.org/includes/img/sliderimage2.png[/img] [IMG]http://penthium.org/includes/img/sliderimage1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2ilkfm9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2ilkfm9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/msy9du.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2ivkvmg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/34hf7rc.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/wsv80y.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/11afndg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2ew1ra9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/25qqko3.png[/img]
[img]http://profile.ak.fbcdn.net/hprofile-ak-prn1/s32x32/50275_37150272417_5313_q.jpg[/img]PenthiumRSPS
We accept any feedback or critism ! Thank you !
Credits : Poesy700 Insenthium Luna Nosere Lirim Justah (Ivo)[/center]

item.title: Penthium / 24-7 Hosted / Nice Mature Playeres / Loyal Staff / Join us n
item.dc:creator: @Lirimoo Lirimoo
item.description:
@Lirimoo wrote:

JavaTC:

Played it, and it’s quite buggy. Using a command you don’t have permission to use disconnects you, and basically caused me to loose the starting gear from the tutorial. You can’t seem to store all or x of items, or at least I wasn’t able to. Half the time full screen will end up bugging the love out, you have to wait for npcs to stop moving completely before you can actually attack them. Several others that I can’t be bothered to mention.

We almost fixed some of theese bugs, we will Update it when we fixed all of them.

Read full topic

@JavaTC wrote:

Played it, and it’s quite buggy. Using a command you don’t have permission to use disconnects you, and basically caused me to loose the starting gear from the tutorial. You can’t seem to store all or x of items, or at least I wasn’t able to. Half the time full screen will end up bugging the fuck out, you have to wait for npcs to stop moving completely before you can actually attack them. Several others that I can’t be bothered to mention.

item.dc:creator: @Lirimoo Lirimoo
item.description:
@Lirimoo wrote:

[center][size=36pt]Updates[/size]

Today i’ve customised our Donation System.
We fixed the auto donate, and made a Box, that appears when you choose an item from the dropdown.
In this box there is Information about the Item/status you’ve choosen.

We need more players guys !
JOIN US !

[size=36pt][font=trebuchet ms]WWW.PENTHIUM.ORG[/font][/size][/center]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Lirimoo Lirimoo
item.description:
@Lirimoo wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:12, topic:507656”][quote author=Lirimoo link=topic=625891.msg4258760#msg4258760 date=1363207399]

Cleared up the offensive messages and warned the user. For future reference to everyone, please keep your petty arguments off moparscape.

Thanks, i didn’t even know anyone was posting offensive messages here ?

Someone did, dealt with it now though so there’s no issue

Okay, Thanks again.
Would you mind giving me some Feedback/critism about Advertising Thread layout and server ?
[/quote]
You should add in some more information about the server and why others should join it, it’s always good to know a lot about the server you wish to play.

I’ve locked your other advertisement thread, please refrain from posting more than one in future as its against the rules.[/quote]

Thanks for this.

Read full topic
